package.name: Image_Transform
package.summary: Provides a standard interface to manipulate images using different libraries
package.description: This package was written to provide a simpler and cross-library interface to the image manipulations. Actually it provides : * supports GD * supports Image Magick * supports NetPBM * files related functions * addText * Scale (by length, percentage, maximum X/Y) * Resize * Rotate (custom angle) * Add border * Add shadow

release.notes: Added rotates method to GD driver
